result.title: Convert one string into other
result.content: There are two string A and B. In one move, one carry out either of the following two operations. 1)Swap two adjacent elements of either A and B 2)Swap the first and last element of either A and B. What is the minimum number of operations required so that the two strings become alike. If n=length of strings and A and B, then 1<=n<=10^5. Any pointers on how to approach this problem ?
